Events: Eileen confuses the OECD with the UN and starts her wonderful international as an auxiliary with AGP (today HRM)
It's OFFICIAL, she is an OECD agent and with this new status comes the weight of the responsabilities
Anticipating that technology will be a key thing in the 2000s she does a stage with STI
Eileen gives a try at economy and start her acronym collection. She starts with GDP
Back at AGP, she searchs for her next OECD destination.
Always anticipating, she feels data will be the thing of the future and joins STD
Her collection of acronyms increase and she now masters CLI, CPI and all the others
Eileen makes the move of her life and join PAC
This is the year she recruited her dream team aka "stat eds"
The Factbook enters the digital area and Eileen creates data.oecd.org
Data is confirmed has a key
It's time to say OECD goodbye and start to enjoy
